1.content:
One day you were walking home from high school, when you found a weird colored rock. being a curious person you pick it up and instantly feel your hand get hot. As soon as the heat came it went away and so did the weird colored rock. Just blowing it off and thinking that was weird you walk the rest of the way back to your house. That stone gave you the ability to swap things, to alter things to the way you want them, and you get to choose if anyone notices the change or if reality changes to were its always been like that.

Main Character: Shaun Williams: 15 years old 5'11 brown hair blue eyes a little chunky.

Other Characters: Ashley Mayes: 15 years old barley 5'2 mid back blonde hair brown eyes average size but weak
Anna Weahler: 14 years old 5'7 a little past should length brown hair green eyes skinny
Kourtney Hemling: 16 years old 5'5 short red hair brown eyes on the larger side

Along with other characters and add extra characters if you want

rules: no rules

types of swaps you can do

-body swap: swap bodies between two people

-body part swap: swap body parts between two people (the part does not have to be equal for example: hand for foot hair for ears)

-clothes change: when you put on someone elses clothes you get that part of there body (one peice of clothing can not change the whole body) when you swap your piece of clothing for someone elses piece of clothing all of yours and the swapies clothing piece swap( Shuan swaps his undershirt for ashley's bra. now all of shuans undershirts now belong to ashley and are at her house and all of ashley's bras belong to you and are at your house. you can have it to were people notice the change or you can have it to were people always thought you wore that article of clothing and will think its weird if your not wearing that article of clothing.

-personality swap: you swap the personalities of two people

-mind altering: changes someones mind to how you see fit

-physical altering: changes someones physical body to how you want to see it

-wishes: sometimes when shuan wishes for something the wish will come true.
1.title: gaining powers

12.content: after discovering the weird rock you decided to take a walk around your'e neighborhood to think about what that rock did to you. While walking through the neighborhood you take a little bit longer to walk past Ashley Maye's house. She has been one of your'e best friends for as long as you could remember but recently you have started to get a crush on her. You looked up at her window and saw her using her computer. Taking a moment to get a good look at her you took in every detail you could see ( blonde hair, brown eyes, 36 b cup size, little bit chubby stomach, a perfect butt, was a nice and enjoyable person to be with but she could be an occasional bitch, and you also remembered that she was a little on the weak side. Taking in all these little details you looked at the clothes she was wearing next a pink american eagle shirt along with blue skinny jeans. You got a quick glimpse of her pink bra. Thinking that you should start walking again you went back to thinking about the weird stone and went back to your'e house. Back at your'e house the first thing you did was walking into your room and laying on the bed. You dosed off and had a weird thought.
12.title: walking around the neighborhood

122.content: When you woke up you remembered the dream about you being able to do something with clothes.
122.title: clothes change

choices: Why are you wearing your'e dad's shirt? Go change into something cute
Do i have to do laundry for you so you can wear your'e clothes?
1222.content: Deciding to blow this dream off you get up and go to the bathroom only something didn't seem right. It was like something felt tighter, just have woken up you couldn't really tell. Once in the bathroom you did what you had to do and while you were walking out you looked in the mirror and saw a pink american eagle shirt. You now thought you were in another dream because you were thinking about Ashley. Trying to go along with it you head back to your'e room and look in you drawer with your shirts in it. When you looked in it you didn't see any of your'e shirts in the drawer but instead you saw a bunch of Ashley's shirts. Fully awake now you just hoped it was a prank instead of reality. Searching through the drawer you just saw a bunch of different shirts from american eagle, Hollister, shirts with girl designs on them, and a couple of shirts with cartoons on them. After you checked there you went and looked in your closet where you kept your nice shirts. Only to find out that there were now blouses in there place. Thinking that was really strange you head in to your'e parents room and put on one of your dad's shirts. After putting on a guy shirt you head down stairs and see your mom. You said hello to her and thats when she turned around and said
1222.title: clothes change

13.content: You decided that instead of hanging out at home being bored. You were going to head to the nearest mall.
13.title: at the store

choices: mess with the mother and baby
do nothing and continue into the mall
131.content:
Sense the mall was only a few minutes away, you decided to walk to the mall. Along the way you saw a group of random people waiting for the bus.
The people in the group were:
A mother and her new born baby girl. (The mother looked to be around the age of 29 with a perfect hourglass figure, large breasts, and a bubble butt. The baby girl was wearing a pink dress and was wearing a pink diaper.)
An elderly couple. (The elderly couple was around the age of 70 and had the looks of an average elderly couple.)
131.title: along the way

info.brief_description: one day you get the power to swap body parts along with multiple other powers
